data.trans: Dẫn đến, đưa đến kết quả
data.trans_hint: Những cải tiến trong đào tạo dẫn đến hiệu suất tốt hơn của các nhân viên.
data.en_hint: The improvements in training resulted in better performance of the employees.
data.content_game_1: The improvements in training resulted in better performance of the employees.
data.answer_en_hint: The improvements in training resulted in better performance of the employees.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đột ngột cắt ngang khi chúng tôi đang thảo luận.
data.en_hint: He suddenly broke in when we were discussing.
data.content_game_1: He suddenly broke in when we were discussing.
data.answer_en_hint: He suddenly broke in when we were discussing.

data.trans_hint: Những tên trộm đã ăn cắp và bỏ trốn cùng thiết bị máy tính trị giá 25 000 đô la.
data.en_hint: Thieves made off with $25 000 worth of computer equipment.
data.content_game_1: Thieves made off with $25 000 worth of computer equipment.
data.answer_en_hint: Thieves made off with $25 000 worth of computer equipment.

data.trans_hint: Lily vừa khóc vừa rời khỏi phòng, nên Paul đuổi theo cô ấy.
data.en_hint: Lily left the room in tears so Paul went after her.
data.content_game_1: Lily left the room in tears so Paul went after her.
data.answer_en_hint: Lily left the room in tears so Paul went after her.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta đã phải cầu cứu cảnh sát khi nhìn thấy hiện trường vụ giết người.
data.en_hint: He had to call the police out for help when he saw the murder scene.
data.content_game_1: He had to call the police out for help when he saw the murder scene.
data.answer_en_hint: He had to call the police out for help when he saw the murder scene.

data.trans_hint: Tên trộm đã thoát khỏi cảnh sát và sắp sửa trốn ra nước ngoài.
data.en_hint: The thief has got away from the police and is about to escape into a foreign country.
data.content_game_1: The thief has got away from the police and is about to escape into a foreign country.
data.answer_en_hint: The thief has got away from the police and is about to escape into a foreign country.

data.trans_hint: Tên khủng bố giữ một người bảo vệ làm con tin và yêu cầu viên cảnh sát bỏ súng xuống.
data.en_hint: The terrorist held a security up and asked the policeman to drop his gun.
data.content_game_1: The terrorist held a security up and asked the policeman to drop his gun.
data.answer_en_hint: The terrorist held a security up and asked the policeman to drop his gun.

data.trans: Để lại thứ gì đó (ở đâu)
data.trans_hint: Hắn ta đã vô tình để lại súng của mình ở hiện trường.
data.en_hint: He accidentally left his gun behind in the scene.
data.content_game_1: He accidentally left his gun behind in the scene.
data.answer_en_hint: He accidentally left his gun behind in the scene.

data.trans: Dừng xe ai đó vào lề đường
data.trans_hint: Cảnh sát dừng xe hắn ta vào vỉa hè và bắt hắn ngay sau đó.
data.en_hint: The police pulled his car over and arrested him right after.
data.content_game_1: The police pulled his car over and arrested him right after.
data.answer_en_hint: The police pulled his car over and arrested him right after.

data.trans_hint: Họ đã lục soát tung cả tầng hầm để tìm ra tang vật.
data.en_hint: They rifled through the basement in order to find exhibits.
data.content_game_1: They rifled through the basement in order to find exhibits.
data.answer_en_hint: They rifled through the basement in order to find exhibits.
